comments.body:
I haven't touched any `asInstanceOf` code and just wrote couple a tests for it.
Now `(new AnyRef).asInstanceOf[String]` succeeds
What should be the result here?
Is it success in case of prod mode and failure in case of dev mode?
That's good, `asInstanceOf` has a bunch of other corner cases we don't fully handle right now, apart from null. I'm going to look at this today. This definitely should go into a separate PR.
